phrase: Our Artificial Intelligence powered tools use millions of project data points to ensure that your project is successful

items.title: Supervisor
items.description: Monitors activity to identify project roadblocks

items.title: Team Builder
items.description: Scans our talent network to create the optimal team for your project

items.title: Karma
items.description: Regularly evaluates our talent to ensure quality

items.title: Calculator
items.description: Uses data from past projects to provide better delivery estimates
